name: Cajun Fuzion
text:
Louisiana Seafood Boil
A mix of shrimp, king crab, andouille sausages, mussels, corn (if available) and potatoes steamed in cajun creole sauce.
Mini - $31.95 (Feeds 1 person)
Small - $52.50 (Feeds 1-2 people)
Large - $97.25 (Feeds 2-4 people)
Snow Crab Boil
A mix of shrimp, snow crab, sausages, mussels, corn and potatoes topped with Cajun Fuzion's signature cajun creole butter.
Mini - $29.95 (Feeds 1 person)
Small - $48.95 (Feeds 1-2 people)
Large - $98.25 (Feeds 2-4 people)
Shrimp Boil
A variety of shrimp, sausages, mussels, corn,and potatoes topped with Cajun Fuzion's signature cajun creole butter.
Mini - $23.95 (Feeds 1 person)
Small - $42.95 (Feeds 1-2 people)
Large - $80.50 (Feeds 2-4 people)
''Just the Seafood'' Boil
A seafood lovers dream! A mix of shrimp, mussels, king crab, snow crab, and lobster claws all topped with Cajun Fuzion's signature cajun creole butter.
+ Small - $130.95 (Feeds 1-2 people)
Large - $225.00 (Feeds 2-4 people)

Cajun Chicken Sandwich
Cajun grilled chicken breast, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, honey peppered bacon, ancho chili mayo on a toasted ciabatta bun with choice of side.
$17.95
Grilled Shrimp Po-boy Sandwich
Saut√©ed shrimp in cajun butter sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, zesty remoulade aoili on a toasted French baguette with choice of side.
$17.95
Spicy Cajun Wrap
Grilled beef OR chicken tossed in su-ya spice blend, red onions, bell peppers and lime crema in a flour tortilla wrap with choice of side.
$17.95
Spicy Creole Chicken Wrap
Chicken breast baked in creole butter, chipotle mayo, red onions, arugula, fire roasted red bell peppers in a flour tortilla wrap with choice of side.
$17.95
